message:
Dear {{doc.applicant_name }},

Thank you for your interest in {{ doc.job_title }} position.
We're always looking for top talent and we're glad that you're considering us for your next role. If our team feels your skills and experience are a good fit for this opportunity, we'll reach out. And remember, you can always log back into your profile from the careers site homepage to view your status and if needed, withdraw your application.
We also invite you to visit our careers site to find and apply for other positions that match your skills and interests.
We appreciate your interest in working with us!




Best regards,
Excela Solutions Recruiting

subject: Job Application Status

message:
Dear {{doc.applicant_name }},

Thank you for applying for the position of {{doc.job_title}}. We appreciate the time you have taken to share your background and experience with us.

At the present time, there is another candidate whose qualifications more closely match the requirements for this position and, as such, we will not be moving forward with you at this time.

We encourage you to explore other opportunities with Excela Solutions by visiting our careers site to find and apply for other positions that match your skills and interests.


Best regards,
Excela Solutions Recruiting
EA Licensee – 20C0043
name: After Rejecting the Job application
subject: Thank you for your time and interest
